reviews.review: Haven't play too much, as I'm not one for games like this, but personally think the concept is amazing.
This game is scary, spooky, and really fun. I would totally recommend this to a friend. P.S. Imagine a Freddy Kruger killer. That would be dope. Yep.
Слишком багнутый маньяк Майкл, баланс ушел из игры
good game pourra
Fun

Pros:
-well designed survivors (looks like people who would be in a classic horror film)
-well designed killers (Micheal Myers was a great addition)
-for the most part I was able to find lobbys with at least 2 or 3 survivors already in there
-level up system is a nice touch (although not that helpful since matches feel like they can be beaten on skill alone)
-made me jump at times
Mixed:
-Campers (but these guys are really stupid since other survivors can go activate generators)
-matches are thrilling (but I'm sure it will get boring at some point)
Cons:
-weird optimisation (my PC leans more towards recommended settings and I'm playing on medium graphics and I'm only getting 30-40 FPS)
-1 gamemode (like I mentioned earlier the gamemode is thrilling but it will get bland at some point so they should add more at some point, 8 survivors vs 2 killers, 1 killer vs 1 survivor, with the survivor having more items and perks equipped, 1 killer vs 1 killer and so on)
-Steam Workshop (I know more maps will be made in the future but I wanna see what the community can do, I wanna play a scary ass version of Walmart)
Overall: 7/10
At full price I can only cautionsly recommend this, on sale though definitly buy it and play with your friends (and get the Halloween DLC too)

Well, I can just say some simple things about this game!

If you like getting camped 24/7 then this is your game
If you like getting one shooted 24/7 then this is even more your game
If you like getting left behind 24/7 then this is the best game for you

But if your like a decent person... Then please don't play this...

Also, the lastest update SUCKS!

Es una lástima que con tantos progresos de jugabilidad se hayan olvidado del rendimiento.

Ce jeux était vraiment super avant les dernière maj qu'ils ont apportées. Je m'explique , en 60 heures de jeux j'ai put tester le cotée survivant jusqu'au rang 10 et le cotée tueur jusqu'au rang 3 , les maps était très bien faites avec toujours un coin pleins mid accompagnée de double fenêtres ou autre pour avoir une chance de s'en sortir face aux tueurs , maintenant ces simple ils ont supprimée les endroits ou l'ont pouvais s'en sortir , les tueurs court plus vite qu'avant, un nouveau tueur est arrivée extremement cheater , quand un tueur vous poursuit il peut voir des traces rouges derrière vous qui dure 5 secondes minimum. En bref je déconseille ce jeux tant que des vrais changements n'ont pas été apportée car ces un super jeux avec du potentiel mais les devs l'ont détruit en moins d'un mois.

Dead By Daylight, che dire? Ci giocavo prima che Zeb iniziasse a sfornare live e quant'altro. Iniziamo con il gameplay ci sono due modalità: Da survivor l'obbiettivo è semplice, fare 5 generatori per aprire i 2 cancelli di uscita e scappare. Scappare? Si, ma da cosa? "Killer": Sono molti e diversi tra di loro. Il loro compito? NON FAR SCAPPARE NESSUN SOPRAVVISSUTO. 
Pro: -Grafica gradevole
-Gameplay Ottimo
-Aggiornamenti attivi (Ci lavorano)

Contro: -Perk sbilanciati
-Myers/Dottore
-Bug
-Traduzione in Ita? Orribile. Google translate don't save u from "The Italianz hook"
-Zeb ci gioca! Critica a quella persona vivente chiamata "Kenneth" che si lamentava del publico di bambini di Favij. Adesso ha più bambini lui che gli "Illuminati Crew"

01.11.16

In erster Linie möchte ich ersteinmal sagen, wie begeistert und fasziniert ich von diesem Spiel bin! Das Spielprinzip ist relativ einfach gestrickt, aber totzdem ist es genial! Dieses Spiel hat einen riesen Suchtfaktor. Man möchte immer weiter und  höher mit seinem Level kommen, mehr Blutpunkte erlangen und dafür echt tolle Belohnungen kriegen und vorallem möchte man eines- überleben/alle töten. :D Was ich erstaunlich und bewundernswert finde ist, dass obwohl man eigentlich immer das gleiche macht, es nie langweilig wird.
Denn irgendwie ist jede einzelne Runde nochmal anders. Jeder Killer tickt anders, und da man sich immer seinem Spielstil anpassen muss (um bestenfalls zu überleben) wird es nicht langweilig. Man spielt jede Runde immer etwas anders. Und als Killer ist es genau das gleiche. Hier gibt es ja derzeit 5 verschiedene: den Fallensteller, den Geist, den Hinterwäldler, die Krankenschwester und, den neuesten, Michael Myers.
und ich finde es unglaublich schön, dass jeder sozusagen seine eigene Fähigkeit hat. Somit spielt hat man auch mit jedem einzelnen Killer eine verschiedene Taktik.
Ein weiterer Punkt, warum es nicht langweilig wird ist, dass es immer neue Updates gibt, an neuen Maps, Verbesserungen usw gearbeitet wird ( wie jetzt z.B beim Halloweenupdate ), wodurch es nicht immer das gleiche ist, sondern man halt oft Neues kennenlernt.
und zu guter Letzt will ich noch sagen, dass ich es sehr schön finde, dass man mit seinen Freunden überleben/seine Freunde töten kann. Durch diese Funktion sind schon viele lustige Runden entstanden :D.
Somit kann ich dieses Spiel nur wärmstens empfehlen. Dieses Spiel ist aufjedenfall sein Geld wert!
Nice game, but now you have to pay a shitload for the game (unbalanced as fuck, and the fps is low even in high end computer), now pay for the dlç's?? this is becoming payday2.

I think it's a pretty good game for what it is. Honestly, I think the people complaining about the op killers just kinda suck at stealth games. I can win plenty of times in a row as a survivor but you also have to nail it on the skill checks and actually be pretty good at stealthing around and to not be afraid of making plays while the killer is aggroed on your team mates. I feel like some of these people that are rating it badly are the same people who do jack sh*t in games and cant turn on generators/ stay still in stubtlety when the killer is right by them. 

I had a game where I crouched still in some grass just two feet away from the killer by the hatch as the last survivor while he was revving up his chainsaw, and he walked passed me twice then I jumped down the hatch right in front of him. That was awesome. I shat my pants and I don't even wear pants.

首先，这款游戏的氛围打造的真的很不错，新屠夫的出现，让很多人一开始都找不到方法来对抗。新屠夫的技能真的完美得契合了恐怖游戏。


萌新们会忽然抬头发现，一个人在远远地一动不动得看着你。。。


现在版本主要大家还不适应与新屠夫的对抗，新人类的技能大家也都米有很好得利用起来，所以导致带的伪人皇开始喷版本，真人皇早已拿起了光剑。实话说，现在人类是相对难玩了，但并不是没有逃生的希望，在看似绝望中留有一点希望，才是真的恐怖。竞技性和恐怖感很难平衡拿捏，我觉得制作组已经很棒了。

Where to even begin on this one.. Dead by daylight is a game that i used to enjoy, it has some really bad moments that will make you hate your life and also very good moments where you are on the edge of your seat (For example when you're the last survivor playing against a bloodwarden/noed killer and trying to stay alive until bloodwarden goes on cooldown so you can escape) with a increased heartbeat. 

But after 300 hours i'm just kinda done with this game. Note, i'm not really the best player out there and never pretend to be so. If i die from making a mistake (When my autistic brain for example fails to understand something, such as when there's to much going on making me lose the entire overview of the match i'm in. Hence why i'm not the best player out there and never will be which is fine) than that's indeed on myself, this is just purely how i feel about it.

The matchmaking is imo the biggest issue the game currently has. As a survivor you will either get paired up with beginners or bots who don't know what their doing who will simply stand still/throw the game, or you will get paired up with the most godlike survivors you've ever seen who end the game in 10 minutes or less leaving you to barely even playing the game at all.. Killer side is similar to this, you will either get a easy 3-4k or you will have the most annoying time of your life. Not to forget that you can also get matched up with either survivors or killers that literally have 10 times the amount of hours that you have, which makes it pretty much impossible for you to do anything.

Dead by daylight also has one of the most toxic communities like ever, both sides (Survivor and killer) has enough players that will say the worst stuff possible in the endgame chat (The chat after a match). The toxicity in the dead by daylight community makes the old days of mw2 lobbies look like it was the most tame/mildest crap ever.

The developers also don't seem to care much about ongoing issues such as straight up hacking/cheating, you can report players all you want who use illegal software/programs to gain a advantage but the developers appearently barely ever act on it. Not only that but there's also still some issues with hitboxes.. Take huntress as the main example (In my opinion), the hitboxes of her hatchets are still beyond broken.. Either you will throw your hatchet straight at someone and it completely passes trough them or you can literally flick your mouse, throw your hatchet 200km away from the survivor that you want to to throw it at and you will still hit them.. Why?.. It's absolutely wild and i have 0 idea on why it's still a thing.

Anyways... Does all of that mean that there's no fun in dead by daylight? No, ofcourse not. You can have plenty of fun in dead by daylight and you can jump in as a newer player just fine, just be beware of all the negatives dead by daylight has which made me drop the ball. Dead by daylight also consists of a insane grind and the only stuff that's actually behind paywalls is killers and survivors themselves, you can still get the newer perks for free though trough the shop when they are in rotation and you can play on every single DLC map without paying due to the map rotation. Dead by daylight also has a insane learning curve, if you master certain things than you can do some really crazy plays..

Anyways, that's it for me. I will leave it at that.. I won't really bother with this game anymore until there's some actual changes, mainly just the broken matchmaking that needs a change/fix.
yes

This game is a lot of fun if you play it with your friends. The only thing that makes this game miserable is the stupid bugs and exploits. The killers can lag switch making your game laggy in favor of the killer. The developers haven t fixed a ton of bugs since the release of this game. The game also favors killers and produces a lot of new maps that don t have an open space so you can t loop the killer or 360 them. The developers want to make this game a scarry one where survivors don t loop killers and bully them, instead they hide in fear when they hear the heartbeat. Even the main menu of this game is as buggy as the game. It disconnects you from the aftermatch without updating your rank . It kicks you from your friend s lobby and you have to be invited again. 
I would not have a problem if all of these happen like once a day or once a week, but NO. These bugs happen EVERY hour. 1/4 games kick you out of the game to the main menu and won t update ur rank. The animation when the survivor is on the hook is buggy as hell. You are like 1m away from where you should be hanging. Also the hitbox that the survivor have is a HUGE BOX where the killer can hit you. It s almost impossible to not get hit  by the Killer. The hitbox is that big because they don t want survivors to do 360. The killers also have auto aim. Buy  this game just to play killer. You won t have any fun as survivor at all. 
Don t buy this game if you are looking for a competitive game where skill matters.
